channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Midjourney v7 launches with voice prompting and faster draft mode — why is it getting mixed reviews?
item.description: While most Midjourney releases were met with overwhelming excitement and adulation, the initial reception to v7 is decidedly more mixed.
